question:
In context with the release of the Global Wealth Report, consider the following statements about wealth distribution:
  1. US has the most people in the top 10% of the global wealth distribution.
  2. Most of the global wealth is owned by the richest 10% at the top.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Global Wealth Report showed that China is the country with the most people in the top 10% of global wealth distribution. China has displaced USA from this position. China showed a 2.6% change in wealth per adult in 2018 to 2019. Statement 2 is correct: Most of the global wealth is owned by the richest 10% of the world. This is 82% of the total global wealth. The top 1% alone holds about 44% of the global wealth. The bottom 50% of the population accounts for less than 1% of the global wealth.
